title: Difference Between Algorithm and Model in Machine Learning
description: A very common confusion among those new to machine learning is the difference between a machine learning algorithm and a Model in machine learning. The two terms are often used interchangeably, which makes it even more confusing. So in this article, I will tell you what is the difference between algorithm and model in machine learning.
